properties.name: data-store.path
properties.description: Directory to store info and doc cache data in.

properties.name: jcl.javadoc.path
properties.description: Path of the JCL documentation to use.

properties.name: cache.approxLimit.info
properties.description: Rough limit of in-mem artifact info cache

properties.name: cache.approxLimit.docs
properties.description: Rough limit of in-mem artifact documentation cache

properties.name: cache.approxLimit.deps
properties.description: Rough limit of in-mem artifact dependency information cache

properties.name: auth.admin.password
properties.description: Temporary admin password, empty results in error if admin access is enabled

properties.name: auth.admin.enabled
properties.description: Whether admin access is enabled or not
